CutSceneText.Text: ...the ship the Steel Rake Pirates sail through the Abyss.
...They plunder where they will...they strike fear in all hearts, nyerk.
We're in a cell in the brig below decks.
Next to us is the ship's Power Chamber.
It's Balaur fuel that powers the Rake...
...and Chief Engineer Lahulahu that drives her.
But Daeva may have noticed the ship isn't sailing anywhere just now.
No, anchored somewhere in the Abyss between Elysea and Asmodae undergoing repairs...
...which means now is the time to make your escape.
